1.content:
First off remember this is a FULLY UNAWARE story.

What story line are you playing?
1.title: The Beginning....

111.content: Looking around at the surroundings, you notice your about a 1/2 inch when standing next to the gap under your bedroom door. You go out into the hall, take a left, and 3 doors down. It seems like hours after struggling through the carpet fibers. You slip under the door and enter the bathroom. The lights are off and only a dim amount of light is coming in through a window. Deciding you have to pee, you climb up the toilet and stand on the rim of the seat, relieving yourself. As you finish up the door opens and someone stumbles in still half asleep...
111.title: Male

info.brief_description: This is yet another unaware giantess interactive but with a twist...
info.description:
This is a twist on most unaware giantess interactive because in this one (unlike most others) I will allow underage stuff. BUT THIS MUST BE 100% UNAWARE AT ALL TIMES. You can be thought of as a bug but never seen for who you are.

One day you wake up in your room half an inch tall and your family is home. Your mom Jenny, and 4 sisters. Hannah 18, Jan 14, Emily 10, and Bella 7. Enjoy!

***I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO REMOVE/EDIT ANY CHAPTERS ADDED IF I BELIEVE ITS NEEDED! I WILL NOT FOLLOW THIS INTERACTIVE UNLESS SOMETHING IS BROUGHT TO ME ATTENTION VIA EMAILING ME.***

Rules will be added as needed.
*No Scat Stuff (unless in seprate labeled chapter)
*No fart stuff (unless in seprate labeled chapter)
*Only female interaction.
*Only 1 tiny (you).
*You can't die.
*You can be molded into anything. When given time left alone your body will reform on its own.
*Any Stupid chapters will be removed without warning.
* *Rule Place Holder*
